text: min pasuvada (makkāvāsīngen) kavurun viśvāsaya tabā (tamangē) raṭagama athæra damā piṭatva gos, oba samaga ekkāsu vī (saturanṭa erehiva) yuddha karannōda, ovunda obaṭa ayat ayayi! (itin) allāhgē dharma niyamayanṭa anuva (obagē) gnātingen æti ayagenma keneku anit kenāṭa (ayitivāsikamen) itāmat samīpayan vannāha. niyata vaśayenma allāh siyalla hon̆din danneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
